relproducts.title: Summer Trail Essential - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: We love the relaxed pace of life that comes hand in hand with country living, which is probably why summer trail essential caught the eye the moment we saw it. The florals are elegant and enjoyable - two things that we all hope for from their new look interiors. If you want to be able to celebrate the way in which the light enters the living room, you need a roller blind that brings everything together in perfect harmony.

relproducts.title: Tranquil Summer - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Delicate water-paint florals set a beautifully peaceful scene on the tranquil summer, with pretty wildflowers in rich purples, deep pinks, and pale lilacs. The cream, light-filtering backdrop has a near translucent feel, perfect for watching the light trickle through on a sunny day. The summer will add delicacy and charm to a country kitchen, where it can sit elegantly amongst light cream walls and units, accented by pinks and purples to bring out the gorgeous hues in this attractive blind.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Daphne Summerbright - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The modern, trendy summerbright from the daphne range combines navy blue with a cool, mustard yellow on a light, off-white background to form a contemporary design with a classic twist that the whole family will love. Work in style with the summerbright taking centre stage in your home office, countered by matching soft furnishings and modern, functional furniture. Or step away from conventional kitchen colour schemes by making this the starting point for your dcor style in the heart of the home.

relproducts.title: Summer Trail Pastel - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Summer trail pastel combines contemporary colours with country chic to create a fabric that you'll instantly fall in love with. The beauty lies in the simplicity with which the intricate florals adorn the finely woven canvas. Just what you need to lose yourself in the moment. When you want to create a theme that brings your space to life, it's all about celebrating authenticity. Use natural textures like hessian, slate, and bare wood to create a lived in space that instantly welcomes you to put your feet up and take it easy.

relproducts.title: Summer Trail Blossom - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Summer trail blossom is the finishing touch to one of their most popular ranges, and the selection of country chic colours are the reason we consider it one of their jewels in the crown. There are so many exciting creative avenues that open up to you that it'll be hard to know which one to explore first. Crisp blues and light mint greens will work in perfect harmony with blossom to create a look that will live long in the memory.
